1136430.name: Akash: Path of the Five - Digital Deluxe Edition DLC
1136430.description:
The Akash: Path of the Five Digital Deluxe Edition DLC contains the following:

  • 25-track OST, featuring a sweeping score composed by Fat Bard and produced by Truant Pixel
  • 40 Meme stickers for use in social media featuring Aurora, Lux, Ignatious, Caspian, Rowan, and Rocco in hilarious poses.
  • A 4K Wallpaper featuring the main characters.
  • A very special edition CG / Wallpaper featuring the mysterious 6th suitor.
  • A 44-page digital artbook featuring unseen and unused content, a look into the creative process, hilarious comics, and more!

The Akash: Path of the Five Original Soundtrack contains full-length versions of the following tracks, delivered as 320kbps mp3 files.*

1. Akash Village Theme
2. An Awkward Situation
3. A Life or Death Struggle
4. A Friendly Skirmish
4. Catharsis
6. A Cheerful Mood
7. Comic Mischief
8. Unsettling
9. Curiosity Piqued
10. Looming Danger
11. The Dream
12. Beacon of Hope
13. Daring Escape
14. Love Theme: Daniel
15. Love Theme: Rocco
16. Love Theme: Ignatius
17. Love Theme: Lux
18. Love Theme: Rowan
19. Love Theme: Caspian
20. Sadness
21. Student Quarters
22. TEnsion
23. Akash: Path of the Five Grand Theme
24. Akash: Path of the Five Main Titles
25. Akash: Path of the Five Reveal Trailer Theme

*(Once downloaded, all bonus content can be found in the root of the game installation folder.)
1136430.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
